objects.text:
• Premium CBD Collection
• Multiple Formulations Available
• 200mg CBD Content
• Lab-Tested for Quality

product_details.name: Blue Ridge Hemp Co. Premium CBD Collection - Natural Wellness Solutions
product_details.description:
• CBD-infused products from trusted Blue Ridge Hemp Co.
• Multiple formulations available in convenient packaging
• 200mg CBD content in 2oz jar for optimal potency
• All-natural hemp-derived ingredients
• Various product formats including topicals and oils
• Lab-tested for quality and purity
• Easy-to-use applicators for precise dosing
• Professionally packaged with clear labeling
• Made in USA from premium hemp extracts
• Perfect for wellness and self-care routines

banner_details:
This modern promotional banner is designed to highlight a wellness product collection using a clean, grid-based layout. The top portion includes a bold, all-caps primary heading ("heading") in a rich forest green and a vibrant subheading ("subheading") in warm orange to draw attention. Below, a concise bullet-list feature section ("description") sits beside an image of three product bottles ("product_image"), placed inside a soft rectangle to separate them from the background. The bottom block uses a dark green segment to host a compelling white tagline ("tagline"), pricing emphasis ("price"), and a call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta"), designed in orange with curved edges for visibility and accessibility.

**Color Palette:**
- Forest Green: #2D5D3B  
- Warm Orange: #D68C45  
- Soft Cream: #F0F7ED  
- Pale Leaf Green: #E8F4E5  
- Shadow Green: #84A98C  
- Stone Gray: #CAD2C5  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features three CBD roll-on bottles in rich, earthy tones—Rust Orange (#B24930), Teal Green (#3D6C67), and Mustard Yellow (#D9A441). Each bottle is paired with a deep black cap (#1C1D1F), enhancing contrast and drawing attention to the body color. The colors are presented with a matte finish, giving a grounded, natural feel—ideal for wellness branding. The white logo and text create a sharp contrast against each colored background, ensuring brand visibility. These bold yet harmonious tones can be used in an ad banner to communicate vitality, wellness, and natural ingredients, balancing saturation through dark caps and clean white typography.
